Talk_0015:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I hope I can find someone to pawn off this <clr:0000>weird
rock<clr:ffff> on soon.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Where's the railcar?<sp:5:1:0>
Just a moment...
Talk_0032:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0101>Heh heh! Now that Hudson's back at the site,
there's no one to stop me from collecting that fee.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It gets slippery in the rain, so please
watch your step.
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's thundering, so please remove all
metal before boarding.
Talk_0035:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I thought it might be valuable when I picked
it up, <sp:5:1:0>but this <clr:0000>weird rock<clr:ffff> is giving me the creeps.

I've gotta hurry and find some sucker to—<sp:5:1:0> Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Humming>The <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff> connects the town and the
construction site, and anyone can use it
for free. Son and done!
Talk_9002:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>This rock belongs to me. I'm not going to
give it away for free.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But if you really want it, I would consider selling it
to you...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Heading to the <clr:0000>construction site<clr:ffff>, eh?<sp:0:4:0>There's a small fee to use the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>.
I'll collect that for you.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>Cut the jokes. You don't have <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>!


If you can't afford a teeny fee like that,
then there's no way I'm letting you use
the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>.
Go find some other way to get to the
construction site.
Talk_0038:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I thought it might be valuable when I picked it up,
but then it started glowing. Ugh. Creepy.

This is a seriously <clr:0000>weird rock<clr:ffff>. I gotta hurry and find
some sucker to—<sp:5:1:0> Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_9004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you want this rock that badly, I would
consider selling it to you...
Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wha—


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>He's actually gonna buy this weird rock I found?
It's my lucky day!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01><clr:ffff>Th-that's great! You have a good eye, sir!


This is definitely a very valuable rock, so
you've made a wise purchase!

And now, this rock belongs to you.
No refunds.
Talk_0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseS_01>Th-thank you. OK, <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>, then, and
it's all yours.
Talk_9006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_01>Can you come back here for a minute?
I've got to swap it out for a new one.
Talk_0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wha—


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>He's actually gonna buy this weird rock I found?
It's my lucky day!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01><clr:ffff>Th-that's great! You have a good eye, sir!


This is definitely a very valuable rock, so
you've made a wise purchase!

And now, this rock belongs to y—
Hey, wait a second.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You don't have enough rupees!


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Ugh, don't get my hopes up like that!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_9007:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>Ugh. Those Zonai devices are useful and all, but I
wish they didn't disappear after too much use.<sp:5:2:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, no exceptions.<sp:5:0:0> But you
only need to pay it once!

One fee, unlimited rides? That's a
bargain. How about it?
Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>C-<sp:5:0:0>can you see that? Th-the light coming
from this <clr:0000>weird rock<clr:ffff>?

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0501>I don't care if it's valuable. It's way too creepy.
I gotta hurry up and find some sucker to buy it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Sorry, but you can't take the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff> until
you pay the fee.

If you want to use it, talk to me first.
Talk_0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah! You mean that weird rock did
something useful?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Honestly, I had no idea what you were
planning to do with that thing.

But that's good to hear. I'm glad you
found a use for it.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I should have sold it for a higher price. Ah well.
Any profit is good profit.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_9009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>I can't have people making off with the
railcar. Bring that back where it belongs,
if you don't mind.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I charge a fee to use the railcar,
but you only need to pay it once.
It's <clr:0000><sp:5:0:0>20 rupees<clr:ffff>. What do you say?
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Hudson made this railcar! There's only
one like it in the whole world!

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Oh man, oh man! If I don't fix this quick, I'm gonna
get it!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0055:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_00>So 50 rupees for a <clr:0000>weird rock <clr:ffff>I picked up, huh...
Well, that's not so bad. <sp:5:1:0>Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>I managed to get it working again, but it
wasn't easy! So be careful. Got it?
Talk_0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>It's the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff> usage fee that I
collected earlier.<sp:0:4:0>I guess you can call it a change of heart
or whatever. I was there when Mattison
said her goodbyes.
As a father, seeing her leave hit me right
in the parental feelings.

I started thinking it's about time I
did honest work. For my daughter
Hunnie's sake.
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01>It has nothing to do with Hudson finding
out I was charging a fee and getting mad.
No, nothing like that!
Talk_0023:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I could tell Hudson my name is Hagie a thousand
times and he'd still call me Hagieson.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0058:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah, sir!<sp:5:0:0> Good timing!


Here's this back...
Talk_0024:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hudson looked really down when he went back to
the construction site. I wonder if he's OK. Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0059:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Need something at the construction site?<sp:0:4:0>There's no fee to use the <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>, so folks
of all ages can use it freely.
Talk_0025:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>This...<sp:5:0:0>goes here? And that bit...<sp:5:0:0>here...maybe?


This stupid thing would be easier to fix if it didn't
use those fancy <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0027:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hopefully Hudson will go back to the construction
site soon. It's riskier to charge that fee when
he's around.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>It's President Hudson's pride and joy—<sp:5:0:0>an
amazing contraption connecting Tarrey
Town and the <clr:0000>construction site<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
There's been a lot of strange happenings
lately. Things falling down from the sky
right onto the construction site.
Hudson has turned into quite
the inventor.

Best I can tell, he takes what falls out of
the sky and experiments until he makes
something new.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The railcar is a perfect example. It's so
simple to control that anyone can do it—
just <clr:0000>give it a whack<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>If you want to visit the <clr:0000>construction site<clr:ffff>,
feel free to use the <clr:0000>railcar <clr:ffff>over there.
Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>In that case, how about <clr:0000>80 rupees<clr:ffff>?
That's a one-time-only deal, just for you.
Talk_0042: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Shrine?<sp:5:0:0> Huh, what are you talking about?
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Are you interested in this rock?
I found it buried at the construction site.

It's a rare rock, so I stole—<sp:5:0:0> I mean, I took
it as a memento...

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>But if you're interested, I would consider
selling it. For you, a special introductory
offer of <clr:0000>100 rupees<clr:ffff>! What do you say?
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>Are you trying to sell random junk for
outrageous prices again?

Look at that thing—it's basically just a
really big piece of flint.<sp:0:4:0>I'd call 60—<sp:5:1:0> No, <clr:0000>50 rupees <clr:ffff>a
more-than-fair price!
Talk_9010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmph. <sp:5:1:0>Hudson built this railcar himself,
you know. The whole system would fall
apart without it, so leave it be!
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>B-but...I already set an absolutely
fair price...

And he might have...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>OK, no need for the stern-wife look.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>The controls are simple. Just <clr:0000>give it a
whack<clr:ffff> to either start or stop it.<sp:0:4:0>You're free to use it as you please now.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>*sigh* Well? What do you say? It's a real
deal at just...<sp:5:2:0>just <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0012:
<snd:Chat_01>There's a fee for that. You're free to use it
once you pay up.
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Of course he isn't going to buy after you
insulted him with such a high price!

Hudson made this town so that everyone
could live here in peace.

If you do anything to harm that beautiful
vision, you won't get away with it!
Talk_0014: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe he'll buy this <clr:0000>weird rock<clr:ffff> while he's at it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'll place it in the back for whenever
you're ready to take it to its new home.
